ygData.subject: Re: Heritrix Mobile Web Crawling
ygData.msgSnippet: We have also success with crawling m.facebook.com/* comments using Heritrix 1.4 this month. We can currently see the all the comments - not the history part

We have also success with crawling m.facebook.com/* comments using Heritrix=
 1.4 this month.
We can currently see the all the comments - not the histor=
y part which requires login - in NetarchiveSuite Viewer-proxy, but unfortun=
ately not out of the box in Wayback, because of some javascript in Timeline=
.jsp which cuts of some parts of the page and produce xml parsing errors. 
=
If we disable the Wayback toolbar javascript page inserts, we are able to a=
lso see it in Wayback.

All the best
Tue Larsen, Daily manager of Netarchiv=
e.dk

itzfuhrigl@...> wrote:
>
> Hello. We also are interested in mobile web craw=

no success (m.si.edu) using Heritrix in-house last year and using Archive-I=
t (Heritrix) this year.
